\subsection{janta.views module}
\label{\detokenize{janta:module-janta.views}}\label{\detokenize{janta:janta-views-module}}\index{janta.views (module)@\spxentry{janta.views}\spxextra{module}}
Create your views here.

This program deals with task function in our Janta application. 
Different functions related to task will be handled.
